title: Collaborative Assignments
description: Easily create, share, and complete assignments with your friends. Foster teamwork and productivity!

title: Peer Grading
description: Evaluate and grade your friends work to provide constructive feedback and improve learning outcomes.

title: Progress Tracking
description: Monitor assignment status and track your learning progress with a detailed dashboard.

title: Friendship-Based Network
description: Connect with all registered users as friends to study, share ideas, and achieve goals together.

title: Intuitive Design
description: A user-friendly interface designed for smooth navigation and enjoyable collaboration.
